value.title: How ChatGPT turned generative AI into an “anything tool”
value.excerpt: I’ve heard similar things from technologists working on everything from health insurance to semiconductor design. To create ChatGPT, a chatbot that lets humans use generative AI by simply having a conversation, OpenAI needed to change large language models (LLMs) like GPT3 to become more responsive to human interaction.
